org.jpedal.examples.viewer.gui.javafx

Class JavaFXMenuItems

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpedal.examples.viewer.gui.generic.GUIMenuItems
      • org.jpedal.examples.viewer.gui.javafx.JavaFXMenuItems

  • public class JavaFXMenuItems
extends GUIMenuItems
    This class controls everything todo with Menu Items, it holds the objects and their corresponding methods. To initialise the object/class call init()
